definitions: a plump, short-legged burrowing toad with a prominent sharp-edged tubercle on the hind feet, native to North America and Europe.

notes.text: Family Pelobatidae: several genera, including Scaphiophus (of America) and Pelobates (of Europe), and several species, in particular P. fuscus

shortDefinitions: plump, short-legged burrowing toad with prominent sharp-edged tubercle on hind feet
